entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 10:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
